title: Get a beginner-friendly intro to AI development for just $49.97
content:
Macworld

Artificial intelligence technologies are getting more advanced. And they’ll continue to do so for the foreseeable future. Work in a technical industry but only have a basic knowledge of AI? Then get up to speed with the 2023 Ultimate Artificial Intelligence and Automation Developer Bundle, offered with savings of $184 off the regular price for a limited time.

This web-based training package provides a beginner friendly introduction to all things AI. Students will learn about the latest tools, get acquainted with ChatGPT, and discover coding techniques using C++, Python, and Java. While this package likely won’t turn anyone into an expert, it does offer an intermediate understanding which is important for this year and beyond.

The 2023 Ultimate Artificial Intelligence and Automation Developer Bundle features 13 courses. The content is available via the web so there are no class schedules to keep and you get lifetime access so you can go at your own pace. And it’s all facilitated by some of the web’s top instructors, so chances are good you’ll walk away with a deeper understanding of the subject matter.

Get the 2023 Ultimate Artificial Intelligence and Automation Developer Bundle for just $49.97, no coupon codes required, but only until 11:59pm on January 1.
